title: Naturopathic Doctor | Olney | Advantage Integrative Health
description: Advantage Integrative Health, LLC is based in Olney, Maryland and offers naturopathic medical care, helping patients create the ideal conditions for health.
cleaned_text: WELCOME TO AIH is a naturopathic family practice - led by a licensed N.D. - based in Olney, Md. We offer: - Evidence-based, effective holistic wellness and healing - Functional medicine - Natural therapies - Supplements; (vitamins, minerals, herbal medicine, homeopathy) - Education and Empowerment AIH: Our Mission The "Advantage" is a whole person, naturopathic approach to care. We give you time to share your concerns and we treat you as an individual! You get a truly "Integrative" approach to care with the best combination of modern medical diagnosis and proven, safe, effective, natural treatments. We empower you to take charge of your own "Health" with knowledge and understanding of the body and its infinite healing potential. Disclaimer: This website does not provide medical advice of any kind The information, including but not limited to, text, graphics, images and other material contained on this website are for informational purposes only. The purpose of this website is to promote broad consumer understanding and knowledge of various health topics. It is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health care provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition or treatment and before undertaking a new health care regimen, and never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on this website. Advantage Integrative Health, LLC and Dr. John Bohlmann are not responsible for the interpretation and/or the use of any information found on or connected with this website.
